ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
